question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Bali Meet of 2007?
1. The aim of this meeting was to discuss what happens after 2012 which marks the end of first phase of Kyoto Protocol.
2. The developed countries  wished that after 2012 even the developing countries like India and China , should undertake some kind of emission cuts.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Bali Meet of 2007 was aimed to discuss what happens after 2012 which marks the end of first phase of Kyoto Protocol. The developed countries  wished that after 2012 even the developing countries like India and China , should undertake some kind of emission cuts.
